This is usually the right option when it's early diagnosis; when we're realizing that Mom and Dad can no longer stay at home, when we're realizing that they need social oversight, when they need supervision, when they need medical oversight.
This decision - about how to care for an elderly parent when a disease like dementia sets in - is one facing more and more people.
